events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but received the wrong size and would like to request a refund immediately.
The system has categorized this issue under Refund based on keywords in the customer's message.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah to handle the customer's request as soon as possible.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong size. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been returned or if you need instructions on how to return it?
My order number is 78451239. I haven’t returned the jacket yet, so please send me the return label and instructions.
Thank you for the information. I have generated a prepaid return label which I will email to you shortly. Once we receive the item, we will process your refund within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate you sending the return label and confirming the refund timeline.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the money back in your account within 2-3 days.
Just following up to ensure the refund has appeared in your account and that you’re satisfied with the resolution provided.
Since you have confirmed receipt of your refund, we are now closing this case. Please feel free to contact us again if you need further assistance.
